reviews.text: Environment was cosy while staff were welcoming and attentive. For the price, food quality and quantity was great. Draft beers at less than $8++ per pint. This place deserves higher ratings and patronage.

Nice & chill atmosphere with a variety of mouth-watering food options!! Not many people on a weekday night but the vibes were still great with friendly staff :) Was craving chilli crab and was elated to see that they have chilli crab pasta ($24) on the menu! Tasty and spicy chilli crab sauce with juicy clam and prawns, didn't disappoint at all üòã would have liked to have a bit more ingredients in the pasta though~

Also tried the crispy snapper burger ($20), the fish was soft and the buttered buns were even softer! Came with a side of crispy and fragrant truffle fries too, loved it!

Had a hourly happy hour deal going on, got a delicious draught black cab pint for $6.99 üëçüèª

One of the better fish and chip I have tried. The snapper is juicy and the seasoning goes well with the citrus mayonnaise. The crabmeat croquette is average though. Friendly staff and retro ambience üôÇ

We went there to have birthday celebration todag, and we ordered lobster burger and fish and chips. The staff who served us James gave us a very good impression, he is very friendl, attentive and nice.
Will definitely visit again and recommend friends to go
Tried Burgers, delicious and filling. Felt the salt can be balanced a bit better and can introduce some spicy sauce options.
